#summary Instructions on adding or updating files

`MatlabTools` is automatically downloaded by the [http://pmtk3.googlecode.com PMTK3] package. For this to work, the matlabTools.zip file must be kept up to date. 

  # Make sure all of the changes have been checked into the svn repository. 
  # Make sure `MatlabTools` is on your matlab path and Run {{{refreshMatlabToolsZip}}}
  # Check the 'refreshed' zip file into svn.
